item.title: Relocating Servers Maintenance
item.author: Author
item.description: The timeline of the update can be found at the bottom of the post. Reason for relocation We relocated all of our websites/data located on VE1 to NE2, this is so we can remove the VE1 from our workflow. As this was a very old & slow servers which took a while to update things on so we are moving to NE2, which is a faster server & much easier to update with continuous integration.

item.title: Server Configuration Maintenance
item.author: Author
item.description: The timeline of the update can be found at the bottom of the post. The reason for reconfiguration The reconfiguration of the servers came after a recent security issue was found in our backend infrastructure. The on-call engineers scheduled the maintenance for 20:00 on the 29/04/2022. This We also decided it was a better idea to move all of our projects to a GitHub organization rather than a single account & remove our monorepo from our workflow.
